title: THEA 413
intro: An intermediate class designed for students who have a basic understanding of the principles of theatrical design. Students explore in more depth through lectures and focused projects components of costume design process, such as script and character analysis, concept development, research, sources of inspiration, psychology of clothing, rendering as a communication tool, fabric and texture, collaboration principles, and then implement this knowledge in a finished project of costume design for a play/movie and/or musical.
